events.name: Economic Theory Emphasizes Upper Bound on Co Demand
events.wd_label: Economic Theory Emphasizes Upper Bound on Co Demand
events.wd_description: In well-functioning markets, over the upper bound on cumulative Co demand represents close to 10% of identified terrestrial resources.
events.description: In well-functioning markets, over the upper bound on cumulative Co demand represents close to 10% of identified terrestrial resources.

events.name: Research Indicates Global Emissions Need to be Brought Down to Zero
events.wd_label: Research Indicates Global Emissions Need to be Brought Down to Zero
events.wd_description: This transformation will involve all sectors of the economy and has been the subject of several integrated assessments.

events.name: IEA Reports Co EV Demand for an EV30@30 Scenario
events.wd_label: IEA Reports Co EV Demand for an EV30@30 Scenario
events.wd_description: The IEA reports Co EV demand of 350 kt/yr for an EV30@30 scenario, which reaches 30% market share for EVs.
events.description: The IEA reports Co EV demand of 350 kt/yr for an EV30@30 scenario, which reaches 30% market share for EVs.
